SponsorshipLetterForm.Recipient: The Director, National Institute of Technology, Agartala
SponsorshipLetterForm.Subject: Sponsoring an Employee for Ph.D. Programme

Body.Details: We hereby sponsor the mentioned employee for joining the Ph.D. Programme as a full-time scholar. It is certified that the employee has completed 2 years of service as a regular employee. The employee will be relieved from duties during the first three years of the Ph.D. Programme.
